prob_desc_description: n people came to a party. Then those, who had no friends among people at the party, left. Then those, who had exactly 1 friend among those who stayed, left as well. Then those, who had exactly 2, 3, ..., n - 1 friends among those who stayed by the moment of their leaving, did the same.What is the maximum amount of people that could stay at the party in the end?
prob_desc_output_spec: For each test output in a separate line one number — the maximum amount of people that could stay in the end.
prob_desc_input_spec: The first input line contains one number t — amount of tests (1 ≤ t ≤ 105). Each of the following t lines contains one integer number n (1 ≤ n ≤ 105).
